title.en-US: Sip $12 latte while hiking the hills of SF
Sip $12 latte while strolling the NYC streets

Welcome to JavaDrip. We are a boutique coffee company obsessed with the perfect cup of coffee. We believe that the perfect cup starts with the perfect bean and that those beans require the perfect brewing method. This means that we offer both high quality beans and products to meet any occasion and mood. Have a look around and let us know if you have any questions.

title.en-US: Finally - the perfect barista coffee without leaving home.
AI-optimized grinding and delivery ensures that every coffee is just how you like it

text.en-US: Not everyone has decades of experience selecting, roasting and grinding coffee - but that doesn’t mean they don’t deserve a perfect espresso every time. That’s why we’ve worked with the industry’s top experts to create an AI system that gives you the coffee you deserve.

title.en-US: Four user profiles for full taste customization

text.en-US: You may love your family more than anything, but that doesn’t mean you love your coffee the same way. The Cervello di Caffè stores up to four taste profiles, which are applied automatically when you use your app or voice assistant to start the brewing process or can be set manually on the machine.

Combining the greatest traditions with cutting edge technology, the Smart Home Barista puts decades of coffee experience at your fingertips. By learning your tastes and assessing the beans, the smart barista adjusts the grind, pressure and length of each espresso shot to make sure it’s perfect every time.

title.en-US: Find the perfect cup without leaving your home.
